name: Pickle-Pocalypse
description:
You are the sole surviving untainted cucumber in a world of zombified pickles. 

They will get to you eventually... but not before you take out as many of them as you can!

Use your weapons to defend yourself from the pickles for as long as you can.

...but beware, your weapon randomizes every few seconds!

Use WASD or ARROW KEYS to move

Press SPACE to shoot

---------------------------------------------------

This game was made in 2 days as my first ever Ludum Dare entry! 

Gameplay & code by Theo Clarke, art & voice acting by Loucozade

View on Ludum Dare website: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/pickle-pocalypse
